    • reachableSquares

      public java.util.List<Directions> reachableSquares​(Worker worker)
      Method to find all the reachable square moving from a specific square
      Parameters:
      worker - The worker placed in the specific square to analise
      Returns:
      A list of possible directions in which to move

      Method that move a specific worker in the map
      Parameters:
      player - Player that own the worker to move
      direction - Direction in which to move the specific worker

    • buildableSquare

      Method to find all the possible squares in which a specific worker can build

      Returns:
      A list of possible directions in which to build

    • buildInSquare

      public boolean buildInSquare​(Worker worker, Directions direction, Building building)
      Method that build in the position selected,with the type of building selected
      Parameters:
      worker - The worker that will build
      direction - The direction in which to build
      building - The type of building to build
      Returns:
      True if the type of building is correct, false otherwise

    • placeWorkerOnMap

      public void placeWorkerOnMap​(Square square1, Square square2, Player currentPlayer)
      Method that place the workers of a specific player in the game map
      Parameters:
      square1 - First square in which to place the first worker
      square2 - Second square in which to place the second worker
      currentPlayer - The player that is placing the two workers

      Parameters:

      worker - Worker to place

      Returns:

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
